attributes.action: Forget about bringing in Draconian laws on the downloading of music and films
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ISP will NOT be able to differentiate what is downloaded on the internet because as soon as this law is passed then all the p2p (peer to peer) programs will add in obfuscation methods to hide the contents of the stream. You cannot win this fight because it is not just the UK that this is happening in. All that will happen is the ISP will increase the cost of their service to cover the cost of trying to uphold this draconian law.

rejection.details: There is no such law or proposals to introduce such a law.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
